snippet.title: POPGOES: Lost Dreams Chapter 1 | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
!!This video contains flashing lights and loud noises!!

Game Link: https://gamejolt.com/games/lostdreams/742176

One year after the death of beloved inventor Fritz Glade, an old friend gets trapped in the abandoned pizzeria. Will she survive, or will she follow in the creator's footsteps?

'POPGOES Lost Dreams' is a fanmade sequel to Kane Carter's 2016 indie horror game 'POPGOES'. This is a trailer announcing the release of the first chapter: Printed Prisons.

The Team:
Depkis - Director, Character Designer
Mr Apple - Animations, Modelling, Character Renders
ILikeGreen - Programming, Story Writer, Composer
